INTERNAL: Find missing values

Source: R/utils.R
find_na.Rd

Used internally to calculate the number of missing values in one or two variables.

Usage

find_na(data, formula, n = 1)

Arguments

data

A data frame

formula

One or two variables in formula notation: ~var1 or var1 ~ var2.

n

How many variables to analyze. Acceptable values are 1 or 2.

Value

An number (n = 1) or a list of two numbers (n = 2)

Examples

find_na(mtcars, ~cyl)
#> [1] 0
find_na(mtcars, wt~cyl, n = 2)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0
#>
